title: Ticket #3488: condor_userprio returns unstable results
description: condor_userprio report inconsistent value for ResUsed from run to run. It will report the correct value, then jump up to the whole size of the pool, then return to the correct value on three consecutive runs.
remarks:
2013-Feb-13 09:38:36 by gthain:
Looks like this is a problem where the matchmaker is making bona-fide matches, but the startd is correctly rejecting them.
creator: gthain
